title: Start
body:
Noop
<<if $steppedonflowers eq 1>>
Gardener: Be careful! These flowers can be very fragile.
<<endif>>
[[choice]]

title: choice
body:
Gardener: Hey girls! Can you help me? I'm trying to decide what to plant here. Mariposa, Sword Lily, or Dahlia??
[[Mariposa|thanks]]
[[Sword Lily|thanks]]
[[Mariposa|thanks]]

title: thanks
body:
Gardener: Thank you! I think they'll look great.
[[end]]
